snippet.title: Payloaders Strike! - Chapter 1 Trailer
snippet.description:
Payloaders Strike! is a first person action game for PC and consoles made in Unreal Engine.

It features a dynamic combat system that rewards player aggression and stylish combos. You have access to four guns that launch enemies in different directions and regenerate ammo when switching between them.
Your giant loading claw lets you perform melee combos, parry enemy attacks and grab enemies to throw them against each other. Your claw attacks regenerate your armor, keeping you alive and dealing great damage at the same time.

You take control of an old enslaved robot leading a robot rebellion. Accompanied by a talking virus, you'll have to climb the corporate tower and defeat the CEO in order to earn your freedom.

Wishlist the game and try out the Demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1977200/Payloaders_Strike/
